content:
Major Yevlash Ilya Olegovich was appointed spokesman for the Air Force of Ukraine.

About thisreportAir Force of the Armed Forces.

"According to the order of the Commander -in -Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Major Yevlash, Ilya Olegovich, was appointed head of the Command of the Armed Forces of Ukraine," the report said.

Earlier, Elijah Yevlash served in the command of the Land Forces as a senior officer of the public relations service. He headed the communication service with the public of grouping forces and means of defense of the city of Kiev and the press service of the operational-strategic group of Khortytsa troops. A spokesman for the eastern grouping of troops.

As reported by the Armyinform, Colonel Yuri Ignatleaves officeHead of the Public Relations Service of the Air Force Command of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.
title: Major Illya Yevlash is appointed new spokesman for the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces
